original_text: You saw seven stars that I held in my right hand. You saw seven lights in their gold lampstands. Now I will tell you what they mean. The seven stars show what the angels of the seven churches are like. The seven lights in their lampstands show what the seven churches themselves are like.’
korean_text: 네가 본 것은 내 오른손의 일곱 별의 비밀과 또 일곱 금 촛대라 일곱 별은 일곱 교회의 사자요 일곱 촛대는 일곱 교회니라

sentences.original_text: that I held in my right hand

sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 금 촛대 안에 있는 것들입니다

sentences.original_text: what the angels of the seven churches are like
The seven lights in their lampstands show
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 촛대 안에 있는 일곱 빛은 보여줍니다

sentences.original_text: what the seven churches themselves are like
